extendedInfo.description: Budget Manager - This is a simple application that allows you to manually track transactions and balances of multiple accounts in order to keep your budget in check. Also, thank you for the feed back guys.Road map: fix for same name on 2 accts, a widget, and password protection. v0.1.1-Fix for new transaction day issue.

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: I just wish there was a placeholder when the ads haven\'t loaded yet. Countless times I\'ve gone to add a transaction right as the ad popped up and ended up clicking the link. (This may be on purpose).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nearly perfect.
reviews.comment: All I wanted what I put in the credit card. The program is light, quick to load (unlike others I tried), and does what I need.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No features but helpful
reviews.comment: Would be very useful to be able to sort transactions in ascending or descending order. The current default order is confusing. This could be a great app with a few simple upgrades.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it, would love categories for each expense. And a way to chart my spending.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Def what I was looking for. An easy way to see your budget at a glance. Now only if it had a widget..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like this but would love it if I could password protect the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really good if only it gave more options that don\'t involve checking credit or savings. Like cash or gift cards. Needs widget!! And constant reminders
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple and effective.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great. Quick and easy to post a transaction everytime I swipe my card. HTC incredible
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great very simple and easy to use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well if you do not need totals for each pay period. Does not separate dates. Does not separate balance per date.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app, should include categories for items or services purchased
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it except for one major flaw...it has no password protect! If it does, I have yet to find it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Uninstall coz pFinance app has more functionality
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A fabulous app. Its easy to use. And gets what I need done. Highly recommend it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like this application very much so... give it a try
reviews.comment: it seems I\'m having trouble seeing the transaction list though and that would be nice to see. I would also like to be able to delete transactions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would rate it higher if there were more categories like loans & expense
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really good app in times off christmas
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.comment: Love the app, it does what I need it to do, but wish I could search by how I labeled the transactions.
reviews.author: Rebecca Cappadonia

reviews.comment: I unfortunatly have not kept a real bank register in years. I really like this app. Its easy to use and i feel like i am more aware of my spending.
reviews.author: A Google User
